#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long int

ll ans(ll base,ll pow,ll MOD)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(pow>0)
    {
        if(pow%2==1)
            res=(res*base)%MOD;
        base=base*base%MOD;
        pow=pow/2;
    }
    return res;
}

int main(void)
{
    ll t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        printf("%lld\n",ans(7,n,mod));
    }
    return 0;
}
